file_content.text: I see you've made it to Tatooine. Not the most luxurious destination, but trust me--the artifact is close.
You'll need to find the pirate Andronikos Revel. He should be quite familiar with this piece.
Who is this Andronikos Revel and what's his interest in Sith artifacts?
Tell me about him.
He was once a pirate, and the artifact was once a prize.
Do you mean he has the artifact?
What are you implying?
Quite the contrary.
I've always wanted to meet a real pirate!
Oh boy! A pirate!
Careful. Andronikos Revel's reputation, while never playful, is even less so now.
He stole the artifact out of some Sith ruins, but when his crew mutinied, they took it.
I sent a cruiser to recover the artifact, but all they found was Andronikos in an escape pod, half-mad.
We let him stew for a while in Imperial prison, and then released him. He's been hunting his crew down ever since, and we've been watching.
It sounds like you have this whole situation under control.
Why am I here?
Andronikos doesn't know he's been our bloodhound for the last year. He probably doesn't remember or care about the artifact.
Does this Andronikos know you're using him to get to the artifact?
So he's your hound.
Does it matter? He gets what he wants - revenge - and you and I get what we want. The artifact.
What does he do when he finds them?
Hunting them?
A blaster bolt to the head, a knife to the throat. Whatever strikes his mood.
He's never lingered longer than it takes to kill, but Tatooine is different. It's been weeks.
I believe Andronikos has found the leader of the mutiny, and with him, the artifact. Find Andronikos and you'll find a clear course.
Why not wait for him to make his move and capture him again?
Why not lay a trap?
There's no guarantee he will take the artifact if he finds it or that we will know he has made his move.
Where can I find Andronikos?
I don't know precisely.
Yes, my lord.
Andronikos must have come through the spaceport at some point. Start with the shipmaster.
Good luck, apprentice. And remember, every piece draws you closer to your full potential.
